name: brassica
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a family of plants that includes cabbage, broccoli, and turnips, or a plant from this family: He grows mainly brassicas, a family that includes radish, cabbage, mustard, cauliflower, turnips, and broccoli. Oilseed rape is a member of the genus Brassica (cabbage). See also
cruciferous
More examplesFewer examplesTo prevent winter brassicas rocking in the wind, mound soil round their stems. As with other brassicas, kale contains sulforaphane, a chemical claimed to have anti-cancer properties. This week I will sow my winter veg - brassicas, leeks and chard.It can cross-pollinate to create hybrids that contaminate other brassica seeds.
